summary: This document is an email chain from March 23, 2021, regarding a proposal from CACI International Inc. to the USAO SDNY for scanning services related to the case US v. Maxwell (Epstein). The emails show authorization to proceed with the contract, contingent on the status of a separate 'Florida' matter.

persons.name: Contracts Administration
persons.context: Sent the CACI proposal for scanning services to the USAO SDNY for the US v. Maxwell Epstein case.

events.title: CACI Proposal Submission for Case Scanning
events.description: CACI International Inc. submits a proposal to the USAO SDNY for scanning services related to the US v. Maxwell (Epstein) case.

keyFacts: A proposal from CACI International Inc. was submitted to the USAO SDNY for scanning services in the US v. Maxwell (Epstein) case on March 23, 2021.
The authorization to proceed with the contract was contingent on the status of a separate matter referred to as 'Florida'.
The email chain indicates the scanning contract was time-sensitive and suggested using 'AFF' for the process.
